entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary: First post using Publii CMS which is a static HTML creation tool. I intend to use this tool for content with Jenkins to auto-deploy to jnnn.gs Publii CMS --> HTML on GitHub --> Jenkins on Rasp --> SAST --> Deploy on Rasp --> DAST
entry.content:
First post using Publii CMS which is a static HTML creation tool. I intend to use this tool for content with Jenkins to auto-deploy to jnnn.gs

Publii CMS --> HTML on GitHub --> Jenkins on Rasp --> SAST --> Deploy on Rasp --> DAST
